alert.note: Alert for Assumption; East Baton Rouge; Iberville; Pointe Coupee; St. James; West Baton Rouge; Western Ascension (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Ascension, west central St. James, West Baton Rouge, southeastern Pointe Coupee, Iberville, southwestern East Baton Rouge and north central Assumption Parishes through 815 PM CDT... At 745 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Addis, or near Plaquemine. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Baton Rouge, Donaldsonville, Plaquemine, Port Allen, St. Gabriel, Addis, Brusly, White Castle, Maringouin, Rosedale, Grosse Tete, Erwinville, Geismar, Bayou Sorrel, Carville, Belle Rose and Gardere. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 136 and 153. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Assumption; East Baton Rouge; Iberville; Pointe Coupee; St. James; West Baton Rouge; Western Ascension
